name.en: Mirror Magic Master of the Ice Barrier
name.ja: <ruby>氷<rt>ひょう</rt></ruby><ruby>結<rt>けっ</rt></ruby><ruby>界<rt>かい</rt></ruby>の<ruby>鏡<rt>きょう</rt></ruby><ruby>魔<rt>ま</rt></ruby><ruby>師<rt>し</rt></ruby>

text.en: You can Tribute 1 other Effect Monster; you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except WATER Synchro Monsters, also Special Summon up to 3 "Ice Barrier Tokens" (Aqua/WATER/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0), and if you do, increase this card's Level by the same number. If this card is sent to the GY: You can add 1 of your "Ice Barrier" cards that is banished or in your Deck to your hand, except "Mirror Magic Master of the Ice Barrier". You can only use each effect of "Mirror Magic Master of the Ice Barrier" once per turn.
